pageContext.claim: “If they don't want to trade with us anymore, that would be fine with me. We'd save a lot of money.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump continues to misunderstand trade deficits. A trade deficit does not mean a country is losing money. If countries stopped trading with the United States, that would have a devastating impact on the U.S. economy, as not everything can be produced within a country. That's why nations have trade in the first place.
